body:
Hi Greg, everyone,


 From the 3.8 Release Notes:
"Renamed librt.a to librtrad.a, to avoid conflict on Solaris. Almost
everything now gets linked to -lrtrad instead of -lrt."


I just tried compiling the new source on a SuSe box here, and got a 
bunch of  "cannot find -ltrad" errors.  Do I need to be doing something 
different, here?


- Rob
